abstract: James A. Rasulo, chairman of Walt Disney Parks and Resorts, will become chief financial officer, and Thomas O. Staggs, who has served as the financial chief, will take the top job at the $12 billion theme park division.
snippet: James A. Rasulo, chairman of Walt Disney Parks and Resorts, will become chief financial officer, and Thomas O. Staggs, who has served as the financial chief, will take the top job at the $12 billion theme park division.
lead_paragraph: Two of Disney’s top executives are switching jobs – a shift that Robert A. Iger, the company’s chief executive, said in an interview had been in the works since last summer.

headline.main: Two Disney Executives Will Switch Jobs

abstract: Disney reported an 18 percent increase in the fourth quarter, but the company is racing to overhaul a troubled movie studio.
snippet: Disney reported an 18 percent increase in the fourth quarter, but the company is racing to overhaul a troubled movie studio.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES  The financial health of the Walt Disney Company is improving, notably in the area of television, which helped the company report a 18 percent increase in its fourth-quarter profit on Thursday. But a dismal quarter in movies weighed on the company’s results, and its theme park division remained soft.

headline.main: Disney Posts Strong Profit Despite Weakness in Films
headline.print_headline: Disney Posts Strong Profit Despite Weakness in Films

abstract: The company was hurt as vacationers booked at the last minute, sought out promotional offers and stuck close to home.
snippet: The company was hurt as vacationers booked at the last minute, sought out promotional offers and stuck close to home.
lead_paragraph: PARIS  Euro Disney, operator of one of the most popular tourist destinations in Europe, said Thursday that it lost significantly more money over the last year than the previous one, despite a small rise in the number of visitors to its Paris theme park.

headline.main: Euro Disney Loss Is Up, Despite Rise in Visitors
headline.print_headline: Euro Disney Loss Is Up, Despite Rise In Visitors
